divs: sighting detailsi was laying in bed looking out the window (which faces north)at 10:40pm cst on fourth of july. there were no planes in the sky. all of a sudden, i saw this bright red circular\oval shaped object. it was if it appeared out of nowhere. it was headed south (straight to our house)and then abruptly stopped. it stopped for maybe 20-30 seconds and then changed direction and went northwest. it was at the altitude of a "normal" plane. throughout the sighting, it would turn\flash gold and then become red again. it was not a plane - looked nothing like it. the entire sighting lasted about 2-3 minutes.
Summary: I saw a red circular/oval object (larger than a plane) going south and then abruptly stop. It changed direction and went NW and disappeared. Throughout sighting, it flashed gold light.
